info.name: Role Filter
info.description: Filter the user list by selected roles.

changelog.title: Small adjustments
items: Switching from DMs back to a server will reset the filter now

The filter cannot see more than 100 rows at a time due to some discord limitations. When trying to filter on a 100+ member channel, members past #100 will not be included. A warning will pop up explaining this.

changelog.title: Viewing offline members
items: In a future update, there will be the ability to view offline members in a role for servers which have disabled it.
